Notes: The sections are: (1) Trio du second acte and (2) Fantaisie sur des motifs favoris de l'opéra: Chanson à boire (Orgie), Duo and Finale

Liszt work: Marche et cavatine de Lucie de Lammermoor
Notes: Intended as part of the Reminiscences (S.397) but separated by the publisher

Liszt work: Valse à capriccio sur deux motifs de Lucia et Parisina
Notes: Combines motifs from Lucia di Lammermoor and Parisina. The Valse à capriccio, S.401 was revised as No. 3 of 3 Caprices-Valses, S.214 (1850–52).

Liszt work: Valse à capriccio sur deux motifs de Lucia et Parisina
Notes: Combines motifs from Lucia di Lammermoor and Parisina. The Valse à capriccio, S.401 was revised as No. 3 of 3 Caprices-Valses, S.214 (1850–52).

Original work: Nuits d'été à Pausilippe, 12 ariettas and nocturnes (voices and chamber ensemble; 1836):No. 1, \Barcajuolo\"
